actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from the windfall profit tax the first 250 barrels a day of crude oil production of independent producers and royalty holders.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt independent oil producers, in an amount equal to 250 barrels of crude oil multiplied by the number of days in the quarter, from the windfall profit tax.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from the windfall profit tax the first 250 barrels a day of crude oil production of independent producers and royalty holders.
